main event: A T/Sgt sighted a very large yellow ball with a broken tail and green fringe at Greenville AFB on June 22, 1960.
interesting points: The object turned to bright yellow-white as it approached the horizon., The sighting was described as different from many meteors the observer had seen before., The observation was made from the control tower by a military personnel., The course of the object was identified as west., The incident was reported to several military commands.
sighted object: very large yellow ball with a broken tail and green fringe
witness description: T/SGT Roy H Wubker, tower operator
